Talk0068:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Notice_01>From the reports of our forces out
on expedition, the number of Flux
Constructs remaining is...zero?
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseL>Unbelievable! You hunted them all?
Talk0070:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Notice_01>From the reports of our forces out
on expedition, the number of Froxes
remaining is...zero?
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseL>Unbelievable! You hunted them all?
Talk0071:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:SurpriseS>Who'd have thought! I'd heard that your
skills were unmatched throughout Hyrule,
but wow!
Ah, right—Link, please take this.
Talk0069:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Notice_01>From the reports of our forces out
on expedition, the number of
Gleeoks remaining is...zero?
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseL>Unbelievable! You hunted them all?
Talk0072:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>That's a hunting token made especially
for the one who might defeat all of
the Taluses.
We've been working every day to
accomplish it ourselves. I never thought
a single person would do it, and yet!
Talk0073:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Everyone knows about your great deeds,
Link, but it feels good to give you
something tangible as proof of them.
From here forward, it is our solemn duty
to become as brave as you are and fight
to protect the citizens of Hyrule!
Talk0074:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:SurpriseS>Who'd have thought! I'd heard that your
skills were unmatched throughout Hyrule,
but wow!
Ah, right—Link, please take this.
Talk0075:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>That's a hunting token made especially
for the one who might defeat all of
the Molduga.
We've been working every day to
accomplish it ourselves. I never thought
a single person would do it, and yet!
Talk0076:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Everyone knows about your great deeds,
Link, but it feels good to give you
something tangible as proof of them.
From here forward, it is our solemn duty
to become as brave as you are and fight
to protect the citizens of Hyrule!
Talk0077:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:SurpriseS>Who'd have thought! I'd heard that your
skills were unmatched throughout Hyrule,
but wow!
Ah, right—Link, please take this.
Talk0100:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>I...see!


Princess Zelda ascended into the sky
above Hyrule Castle and then vanished?

<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think>What a very strange thing... All the same,
it's a relief to hear she's alive.

Well then.<sp:5:0:0> With that information, the
monster-control crew will resume our
original duty of subduing the monsters.
Of course, if we come across any info
regarding the princess, I will report it
immediately to Purah.
Talk0078:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>That's a hunting token made especially
for the warrior strong enough to defeat
every Hinox.
We've been working every day to earn it
ourselves. I started to think it was an
impossible task, and yet!
Talk0080:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:SurpriseS>Who'd have thought! I'd heard that your
skills were unmatched throughout Hyrule,
but wow!
Ah, right—Link, please take this.
Talk0079:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Everyone knows about your great deeds,
Link, but it feels good to give you
something tangible as proof of them.
From here forward, it is our solemn duty
to become as brave as you and carry out
more monster expeditions for the people!
Talk0081:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>That's a hunting token made especially
for the one who might defeat all of the
Flux Constructs.
We've been working every day to
accomplish it ourselves. I never thought
a single person would do it, and yet!
Talk0102:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think>They spotted something massive in
the Depths. When they tried to approach
it, it nearly swallowed them whole...
I want to sort out what it is and hunt it
down, but we are at a serious
disadvantage fighting in the Depths...
Talk0082:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Everyone knows about your great deeds,
Link, but it feels good to give you
something tangible as proof of them.
With you as our shining example, we of
the monster-control crew are determined
to keep Hyrule safe until the end of time.
Talk0103:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>A creature of unknown origins was found
in the <clr:0000>chasm<clr:ffff> to the south of <clr:0000>Hyrule Field<clr:ffff>.
It looked to be moving southeast.
We heard it's around here.
Talk0083:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:SurpriseS>Who'd have thought! I'd heard that your
skills were unmatched throughout Hyrule,
but wow!
Ah, right—Link, please take this.
Talk0104:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I continue to receive reports about
unusual monsters.

But at this point, we still haven't
pinpointed their exact locations. We
will continue to investigate.
You'll be the first to know once we find
out more.
Talk0084:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>That's a hunting token made especially
for the one who might defeat all of
the Gleeoks.
We've been working every day to
accomplish it ourselves. I never thought
a single person would do it, and yet!
Talk0105:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>I figured you must be pretty tired, so I've
been waiting to tell you about the newest
information I have.
All the intel I've received has been
reported by the monster-control crew,
who are currently on expedition.
What I've got right now pertains to
the <clr:0000>remaining large monsters<clr:ffff> and
<clr:0000>unusual monsters<clr:ffff>.
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Let me know if you'd like to hear what
we know.
Talk0085:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Everyone knows about your great deeds,
Link, but it feels good to give you
something tangible as proof of them.
We will dedicate ourselves more fervently
to monster expeditions, following
your lead!
Talk0106:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>I figured you were pretty tired the other
day, so I've been waiting to tell you about
the newest information I have.
All the intel I've received has been
reported by the monster-control crew,
who are currently on expedition.
What I've got right now pertains to
the <clr:0000>remaining large monsters<clr:ffff> and
<clr:0000>unusual monsters<clr:ffff>.
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Let me know if you'd like to hear what
we know.
Talk0086:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:SurpriseS>Who'd have thought! I'd heard that your
skills were unmatched throughout Hyrule,
but wow!
Ah, right—Link, please take this.
Talk0107:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>These fearsome foes were beyond what
we of the monster-control crew could've
handled by ourselves.
Thank you so much for your aid!
Talk0087:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>That's a hunting token made especially
for the one who might defeat all of
the Froxes.
We've been working every day to
accomplish it ourselves. I never thought
a single person would do it, and yet!
Talk0110:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Good morning, and thank you for your
hard work,<sp:5:1:0> Link!
Talk0090:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy>Hoz's squad is currently taking a break.


Whenever we receive intel about a
monster outbreak, I'll be sending them
out again.
Talk0108:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:TalkPositive>I am so grateful for your continued
interest in and support of the monster-
control crew.
Talk0088:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Everyone knows about your great deeds,
Link, but it feels good to give you
something tangible as proof of them.
We of the monster-control crew will
continue our mission to keep the people
of Hyrule safe, as you have, Link!
Talk0111:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Hello, and thank you for your hard
work,<sp:5:1:0> Link!
Talk0091:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy>Flaxel's squad is hunting monsters in
<clr:0000>Faron<clr:ffff> to the south.

They're aiming to subdue the pirate ship
on the <clr:0000>Menoat River<clr:ffff><sp:5:0:0> to the south of Lake
Hylia.<sp:5:1:0> Which is <clr:0000>west of Highland Stable<clr:ffff>.
If you see them there, do me a favor and
help them out, please.
Talk0109:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Currently I have information on the <clr:0000>three
monster-control squads<clr:ffff> out on expedition
right now.<sp:0:4:0>I've also got intel on the remaining <clr:0000>large
monsters<clr:ffff> and <clr:0000>unusual monsters<clr:ffff>.

Let me know if you want me to fill you in
on any of it.
Talk0089:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseL>Impossible... You're saying that each and
every large and unusual beast has been
torn asunder?!
Just when I thought you couldn't possibly
outdo yourself, you've gone and done it.

<sp:3:0:2:0701>There is nothing more I can give you...


But let it be known that I will forever
remember this incredible feat you
have accomplished, Link!
Talk0112:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Burning the candle at both ends,
hm,<sp:5:1:0> Link?
Talk0092:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy>Flaxel's squad cleared out Faron<sp:5:0:0> and is
now advancing on <clr:0000>Hebra<clr:ffff> to the far north.

They plan to launch an attack on the large
monster fort near the south part of
Tabantha Tundra <sp:5:1:0><clr:0000>near Snowfield Stable<clr:ffff>.
If you see them there, do me a favor and
help them out, please.
Talk0113:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Working hard despite the bad weather,<sp:5:1:0>
Link? Thank you!
Talk0093:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy>Flaxel's squad is currently taking a break.


Whenever we receive intel about a
monster outbreak, I'll be sending them
out again.
Talk0114:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>All of the tools we might have used in
battle are decayed and useless now.<sp:5:0:0>
Despite that, we're all doing what we can.
If you ever run into anyone from the
monster-control crew during your travels,
I'd appreciate you lending a hand.
Talk0094:
Want to know the whereabouts of any
other squads?
Talk0115:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>The monster-control crew is made up of
everyday folks who've volunteered to
protect the people from monsters.
Some are accustomed to battle, while
others...not so much.

<sp:3:0:2:0000>Receiving support from you out in the
field would do wonders for their
morale, Link.
Talk0095:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy>Toren's squad is on the north side of
Death Mountain in <clr:0000>Eldin<clr:ffff>.

They're heading for a cave discovered at
<clr:0000>Lake Darman<clr:ffff>,<sp:5:0:0> which used to be a lava
lake but has since stopped flowing.
They're taking out the monsters nesting
in the cave, so if you see them there, do
me a favor and help them out, please.
Talk0096:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy>Toren's squad is on an expedition to
<clr:0000>Akkala<clr:ffff><sp:5:0:0> after clearing out Eldin.

They plan to launch an attack<sp:5:0:0> on the
monsters blocking <clr:0000>Akkala Span<clr:ffff>, which
is basically the gateway to that region.
If you see them there, do me a favor and
help them out, please.
Talk0116:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>People will sing of the feats you have
accomplished for generations, Link!

In fact,<sp:5:1:0> I'll be leading the chorus!


<sp:3:0:2:0000>Amidst our celebrations, however,
monsters have been revived by the blood
moon, threatening the people's livelihood.
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Angry_00>All of us within the monster-control crew
will do our utmost to continue beating
the monsters back.
When Princess Zelda returns,<sp:5:1:0> she will be
greeted by a prosperous Hyrule, devoid
of these beasts.
Talk0097:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy>Toren's squad is currently taking a break.


Whenever we receive intel about a
monster outbreak, I'll be sending them
out again.
Talk0117:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>When Princess Zelda returns,<sp:5:1:0> she will be
greeted by a prosperous Hyrule, ridden
of monsters.
All of us within the monster-control crew
will do our utmost to continue beating
the monsters back.
Talk0120:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:SurpriseS>So I see! The latest report confirms the
Stone Talus was taken out.
Talk0098:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:Notice_01>Looks like your pouch is full.


I was going to give you my prized
<clr:0000>diamond<clr:ffff>...

<sp:3:0:2:0700>Let me know once you've made
some room.
Talk0118:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>The blood moon can revive monsters
indefinitely...<sp:5:1:0> That is why we must always
be vigilant!
Talk0119:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Our <clr:0000>three monster-control-crew squads<clr:ffff>
provide us regular updates while
on expedition.
They've also been updating us on the
recent <clr:0000>large-monster <clr:ffff>sightings.

Please utilize any and all intel we have<sp:5:0:0>
to better equip you in the search for
Princess Zelda.
And considering you're the legendary
swordsman, maybe you can lend a hand
in the hunt for <clr:0000>the large monsters<clr:ffff>...
I would really appreciate it.
Talk0121:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>To defeat such a formidable monster, well,
that's the stuff legends are made of—and
to do so single-handedly!
I'd expect nothing less from a swordsman
of your renown.

<sp:3:0:2:0100>It's not much, but I've got a reward for
your valor. Please, take it.
Talk0099:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Freed up space in your pouch, Link?
Please. Take this.
Talk0122:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:SurpriseS>So I see! The latest report confirms the
Hinox has been defeated!
Talk0123:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>To defeat such an unyielding beast, well,
that's the stuff legends are made of—and
to do so single-handedly!
I'd expect nothing less from a swordsman
of your renown.

<sp:3:0:2:0801>It's not much, but I've got a reward for
your valor. Please, take it.
Talk0001:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I'm right in the middle of giving out
orders. This group's going to join the
search for Princess Zelda.
So, whatever you need, it's got to
wait until...<sp:5:1:0>

<sp:3:0:2:0b00>What?! Is that really you?<sp:5:0:0> Link,
you've returned!

<sp:3:0:2:0000>I've got to say that it's a relief to see
that you're safe.<sp:5:0:0> I'm Gralens, head of the
<clr:0000>monster-control crew<clr:ffff>.
But we can talk more later.<sp:5:0:0> You need to
report in to Purah immediately. She has
to know you're back.
Talk0124:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:SurpriseS>So I see! The latest report confirms the
Molduga has been defeated!
Talk0002:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>I'm told that your skill in swordplay
is unmatched.

If you ever stumble into one of our squads
during your travels, please lend your
legendary skills to our plight!
Talk0125:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>To defeat such a behemoth, well, that's
the stuff legends are made of—and to do
so single-handedly!
I'd expect nothing less from a swordsman
of your renown.

<sp:3:0:2:0100>It's not much, but here's a reward for
your valor. Please, take it.
Talk0003:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>The squads are moving out on monsters
actively now! I've got current info on their
whereabouts, if you're curious.
Talk0126:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>To defeat such an uncanny beast, well,
that's the stuff legends are made of—and
to do so single-handedly!
I'd expect nothing less from a swordsman
of your renown.

<sp:3:0:2:0100>It's not much, but I've got a reward for
your valor. Please, take it.
Talk0004:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Yes, it's a group of volunteers who've
joined together to defend the people
from the onslaught of monsters.
However, Purah has asked for our aid with
a more pressing matter now.

She's asked us to help in <clr:0000>searching
the castle<clr:ffff>.
Talk0127:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>To defeat such an elusive monstrosity,
well, that's the stuff legends are made
of—and to do so single-handedly!
<sp:3:0:2:0100>I'd expect nothing less from a swordsman
of your renown.

It's not much, but I've got a reward for
your valor. Please, take it.
Talk0128:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Hm?


What?! Is that really you?<sp:5:0:0> Link,
you've returned!

<sp:3:0:2:0000>It's such a relief to see that you're safe.<sp:5:0:0>
Oh, let me introduce myself. I'm Gralens,
head of the <clr:0000>monster-control crew<clr:ffff>.
<sp:3:0:2:0700>We were tasked by Purah to help with the
search for Princess Zelda. But Purah's
since reassigned us to our original duty.
It's our job to keep the monsters at bay
as best we can throughout Hyrule.

<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Happy_00>And we are receiving assistance from the
Gerudo, for which we are deeply grateful.
Talk0005:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>I appreciate you taking the time to visit
the <clr:0000>monster-control HQ<clr:ffff>.

Recently, Purah asked that we suspend
our involvement in the search for
Princess Zelda.
So we've resumed our primary mission to
hunt down the monsters that have been
running rampant since the Upheaval.
<clr:0000>All three squads<clr:ffff> are out on expeditions
at the moment. They've been sharing
updates with us though.
Talk0130:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Currently I have information on the <clr:0000>three
monster-control squads<clr:ffff> out on expedition
right now.<sp:0:4:0>I've also got intel on the remaining <clr:0000>large
monsters<clr:ffff> and <clr:0000>unusual monsters<clr:ffff>.

<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Happy_00>Amidst the hustle and bustle of our work,
I'd be remiss if I didn't mention our deep
gratitude for the aid from the Gerudo.
Oh, and if you're curious to know more
about the monsters or squads, please
allow me to fill you in.
Talk0006:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I've assembled strategies and pertinent
information at our headquarters in the
emergency shelter.
There you'll find folks with an intimate
understanding of Hyrule's geography,
as well.
If any of that is relevant to you, I
encourage you to take the time to
stop by.
Talk0129:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>I appreciate you taking the time to visit
the <clr:0000>monster-control HQ<clr:ffff>.

Recently, Purah asked that we suspend
our involvement in the search for
Princess Zelda.
So we've resumed our primary mission to
hunt down the monsters that have been
running rampant since the Upheaval.
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Happy_00>We are also overcome with gratitude for
the assistance we've received from
the Gerudo.
<clr:0000>All three squads<clr:ffff> are out on expeditions
at the moment. They've been sharing
updates with us though.
Talk0131:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>When Princess Zelda returns,<sp:5:1:0> she will be
greeted by a prosperous Hyrule, ridden
of monsters.
All of us within the monster-control crew,
alongside the Gerudo, will do our utmost
to continue beating the monsters back.
Talk0132:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Hm?


What?! Is that really you?<sp:5:0:0> Link,
you've returned!

<sp:3:0:2:0000>It's such a relief to see that you're safe.<sp:5:0:0>
Oh, let me introduce myself. I'm Gralens,
head of the <clr:0000>monster-control crew<clr:ffff>.
<sp:3:0:2:0700>We were tasked by Purah to help with the
search for Princess Zelda. But Purah's
since reassigned us to our original duty.
It's our job to keep the monsters at bay
as best we can throughout Hyrule.
Talk0007:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Yes. We've assembled a crew to contend
with the monster problem. Purah herself
has coordinated our efforts.
Ever since the Upheaval,<sp:5:0:0> there's been an
increase in monsters throughout Hyrule.

Volunteers have been organized into
three squads to face monsters head-on
and protect civilians.
<sp:3:0:2:0700>In case you're wondering who I am, I'm
the head of those squads.<sp:5:0:0> It's my job to
strategize and deploy them.
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>For a while, we were aiding in the search
for Princess Zelda.

<sp:3:0:2:0000>But we've since resumed our original
mission to keep the monsters of Hyrule
at bay as best we can.
Talk0008: <sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Angry_00>All right, everyone. It's time to move out!
Talk0011:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think>Your interest in our work honors us all.
But please, go tell <clr:0000>Purah<clr:ffff> you're safe.
Talk0009:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Flaxel's squad!


For now, I'm positioning you in the south
of Hyrule. Proceed to <clr:0000>Faron<clr:ffff>.

There are <clr:0000>pirates<clr:ffff> running rampant in that
area, so sweep the coast thoroughly.
<sp:5:0:0>We're counting on you!
Talk0012:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>You'll find Purah in that main building
over there. Hurry, please.
Talk0014:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I've heard tell about a number of
large monsters.
Talk0015:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think>Our comrades out on a survey in Akkala
reported an attack by a Talus!

A Talus looks like a giant, mobile pile
of angry rocks—hard to miss.

With our current weapons, we wouldn't be
able to put a scratch on that thing...
Talk0016:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think>I'm glad you've returned safely, but I am
gravely concerned about the princess.

I'm holding out hope that the <clr:0000>monster-
control crew<clr:ffff> brings back good news.
They're <clr:0000>searching the castle<clr:ffff> for her now.
Talk0017:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Purah has given us orders to search
thoroughly around Hyrule Castle.

That's where we last had contact with
Princess Zelda, so it seems the best
starting point in the search.
Anyway, Purah enlisted our <clr:0000>monster-
control crew <clr:ffff>to help out, so that's where
our efforts are currently focused.
Talk0018:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy_00>I was just debating whether or not to
add reinforcements.

But if you're joining the search, Link,
I can keep our forces on standby.

If you head to the castle, you'll run into
Hoz and the advance party, who will
probably be just as surprised to see you.
Talk0020:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think>Recently there were some travelers
passing by <clr:0000>Trilby Plain<clr:ffff> near <clr:0000>Woodland
Stable <clr:ffff>in northeast <clr:0000>Hyrule Field<clr:ffff>.
Their intel confirmed a sighting of a <clr:0000>Hinox<clr:ffff>
in the area!

Hinox are huge, one-eyed beasts. They
are incredibly strong. So strong, in fact,
that they wield trees as weapons!
We'd go after it, but with that kind of
strength, we'd be in over our heads.
It's a real situation.
Talk0021:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Would you like to ask about other
large monsters?
Talk0023:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think>I have a report saying that a <clr:0000>Molduga<clr:ffff>
was discovered in the <clr:0000>East Barrens <clr:ffff>in
the Gerudo Desert.
The report came from the ground
research team, and they've asked
us to exterminate it.
A Molduga is a terrifying beast that swims
through the sand like a fish.

We'd go after it, but we don't have the
means to tackle a monster that burrows
in the sand like that...
Talk_OnTheDesk:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Also...<sp:5:1:0> I hate to be the one to say this...<sp:5:1:0>


But the documents at your feet show the
monster-control crew dispatch locations
and whatnot.<sp:5:1:0>
So if you could kindly get down from
there,<sp:5:1:0> I'd, uh...<sp:5:1:0>appreciate it.<sp:5:1:0>
Talk0024:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>You... You already defeated it?!<sp:5:0:0>
Incredible!

Well, of course you did, Link. Taking down
a big monster like that all by yourself
comes as no surprise.
<sp:3:0:2:0701>It's not much, but please take this.
Talk0025:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>Here's hoping we can always count
on your expert skill.
Talk0026:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>You've defeated <sp:5:1:0>ALL of the beasts we had
received reports of?!

I'm stunned! <sp:5:1:0>I am in complete and utter
awe of you!

<sp:3:0:2:0100>Legendary swordsman Link, <sp:5:1:0>please
take this on behalf of the monster-
control crew.
Talk0027:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:Notice_01>Ah!


<sp:3:0:2:0c01>If you find it in you, Link, maybe you can
defeat <clr:0000>them<clr:ffff> too...
Talk0028:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>You did?


Which one did you get?
Talk0032:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>I see. Even for someone as esteemed as
you, Link, this is no walk in the park.

<sp:3:0:2:0701>Really, we can't expect a single person to
take down such creatures. We'll all head
out once we've got the strength.
Talk0034:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Hm?


What?! Is that really you?<sp:5:0:0> Link,
you've returned!

<sp:3:0:2:0000>It's such a relief to see that you're safe.<sp:5:0:0>
Oh, let me introduce myself. I'm Gralens,
head of the <clr:0000>monster-control crew<clr:ffff>.
It's our job to keep the monsters at bay
as best we can throughout Hyrule.

But aside from that,<sp:5:0:0> we've been assisting
in the search for Princess Zelda, whose
whereabouts are unknown.
Talk0035:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Link, my apologies.<sp:5:1:0>


Your interest in our work honors us, but
I'm busy giving orders to this group
right now.
Please, let <clr:0000>Purah<clr:ffff> know you're safe. She's
in the <clr:0000>building with the telescope<clr:ffff>.
Talk0036:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Hoz's squad, Toren's squad, and Flaxel's
squad of the monster-control crew are
taking down monsters all across Hyrule.
Talk0037:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy>Hoz's squad is hunting monsters in
<clr:0000>Hyrule Field<clr:ffff>,<sp:5:0:0> to the <clr:0000>south of
Lookout Landing<clr:ffff>.
If you see them there, do me a favor and
help them out, please.
Talk0005_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:Happy_01>Link!<sp:5:1:0> You've got great timing!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>Folks working for the monster-control
crew have been reporting frequent
appearances of some very <clr:0000>large monsters<clr:ffff>.
Our noncombatant squad members are ill-
equipped to take on such foes. <sp:5:0:0>Really,
it's out of the question.
Instead, they're helping by gathering intel
and warning residents in the areas where
the beasts have been spotted.
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think_01>With such <clr:0000>ominous beasts as these<clr:ffff>, I can
think of nobody better qualified than you
to face them in battle.
<sp:3:0:2:0000>That said...<sp:5:0:0> I'm sure you've got your
hands full with other tasks.

Perhaps it's best for you to continue on
without adding to your burdens...
Talk0038:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy>Hoz's squad found victory at Hyrule
Field and moved on to hunt monsters
in <clr:0000>Necluda<clr:ffff>.
They plan to launch an attack on the
monsters maintaining a barrier<sp:5:0:0> at <clr:0000>Fort
Hateno<clr:ffff>, due <clr:0000>east of Dueling Peaks Stable<clr:ffff>.
If you see them there, do me a favor and
help them out, please.
Talk0040: <sp:3:0:2:0701>Want to know about any of the others?
Talk0005_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>I appreciate you taking the time to visit
the <clr:0000>monster-control HQ<clr:ffff>.

Recently, Purah asked that we suspend
our involvement in the search for
Princess Zelda.
So we've resumed our primary mission to
hunt down the monsters that have been
running rampant since the Upheaval.
<clr:0000>All three squads<clr:ffff> are out hunting monsters
and gathering information about recent
<clr:0000>large-monster <clr:ffff>sightings.
They've been sharing updates with us.
Talk0039:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Indeed. I've got some info I can share.
Which unusual creature would you like to
know about?
Talk0041:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think>I've received a puzzling report from
squad members surveying the <clr:0000>west
sky archipelago<clr:ffff> in <clr:0000>Hebra<clr:ffff>.
The report says that a creature, seemingly
made of rock, is moving through
the clouds...
Whatever it is, if it falls to the surface,
damage to the surrounding area would be
severe. It needs to be taken out.
Talk0005_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>I appreciate you taking the time to visit
the <clr:0000>monster-control HQ<clr:ffff>.

Recently, Purah asked that we suspend
our involvement in the search for
Princess Zelda.
So we've resumed our primary mission to
hunt down the monsters that have been
running rampant since the Upheaval.
<clr:0000>All three squads<clr:ffff> are out hunting monsters
and gathering information about recent
<clr:0000>unidentified-monster <clr:ffff>sightings.
They've been sharing updates with us.
Talk0042:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think>A traveler shared information about an
unusual monster who was sighted at the
<clr:0000>Bridge of Hylia<clr:ffff> in <clr:0000>Faron<clr:ffff>.
While crossing the bridge, a three-headed
monster lunged at them. They were so
scared, they dropped their bags and ran.
For the safety of travelers, I want it
hunted down, but I'm not sure how
to get near it. This is a tricky one...
Talk0005_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>I appreciate you taking the time to visit
the <clr:0000>monster-control HQ<clr:ffff>.

Recently, Purah asked that we suspend
our involvement in the search for
Princess Zelda.
So we've resumed our primary mission to
hunt down the monsters that have been
running rampant since the Upheaval.
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Happy_00>We are also overcome with gratitude for
the assistance we've received from
the Gerudo.
<clr:0000>All three squads<clr:ffff> are out hunting monsters
and gathering information about recent
<clr:0000>large-monster <clr:ffff>sightings.
They've been sharing updates with us.
Talk0043:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think>Monster-control members have reported
sightings on a survey in the Depths...

Do you have a map handy?
Talk0005_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>I appreciate you taking the time to visit
the <clr:0000>monster-control HQ<clr:ffff>.

Recently, Purah asked that we suspend
our involvement in the search for
Princess Zelda.
So we've resumed our primary mission to
hunt down the monsters that have been
running rampant since the Upheaval.
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Happy_00>We are also overcome with gratitude for
the assistance we've received from
the Gerudo.
<clr:0000>All three squads<clr:ffff> are out hunting monsters
and gathering information about recent
<clr:0000>unidentified-monster <clr:ffff>sightings.
They've been sharing updates with us.
Talk0044:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>You've already defeated it?!<sp:5:0:0> I can't
believe it!

<sp:3:0:2:0100>No, I can. Really, it's just like you, Link, to
be off on the next conquest before we've
even begun to hear about it!
It's not much, but please take this.
Talk0045:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>Here's to hoping we can always count
on you!
Talk0047:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Say what now?


You hunted an unknown monster?
Which one did you get?!
Talk0048:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>So I see! Looking at the latest report, it
DOES say the unusual giant in the clouds
was taken down!
It's referred to as a Flux Construct,
I believe, unless I'm mistaken.

<sp:3:0:2:0101>Well! Defeating such a fearsome foe... I'd
expect nothing less from the swordsman
famed throughout Hyrule.
It's not much, but I've got a reward for
your valor. Please, take it.
Talk0050:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>So I see! Looking at the latest report, it
DOES say the huge silhouette has been
taken down.
It's referred to as a Frox, if I'm
not mistaken.
Talk0049:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>So I see! Looking at the latest report, it
DOES say the three-headed monster was
taken down.
It's referred to as a Gleeok, unless
I'm mistaken.
Talk0051:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Even a swordsman such as you must find
these beasts challenging. Once we have
amassed enough force, we'll head out.
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Master swordsman, will there be
anything else?
Talk0052:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Are there...any of the other unusual
beasts that you've slain?
Talk0053:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Aha! You've defeated ALL of the unusual
monsters that were reported!

I'm speechless... Well, mostly.
I'm thoroughly impressed!

<sp:3:0:2:0100>Please, take this.
Talk0054:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>While you were out hunting monsters...


we received <clr:0000>eyewitness accounts of large
monsters<clr:ffff> at monster-control-crew HQ.

The monsters were spotted roaming in a
few different regions. We just wrapped up
compiling all of the info on them.
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I'd be happy to tell you all about it.


But you've got to be tired, so please take
some time to rest up and check in with
me later.
Talk0055:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Link. Thank you so much for hunting down
those three beasts.

I was wondering if I might...trouble you
for help yet again.

Just recently, we've received troubling
accounts about monsters we've never
heard of before.
We're hard at work gathering what
intel we can regarding these new
fearsome beasts.
Talk0056:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I am in perpetual awe of you and all
of your accomplishments, Link!
Talk0065:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Notice_01>From the reports of our forces out on
expedition, the number of Taluses
remaining is...zero?
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseL>Unbelievable! You hunted them all?
Talk0066:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Notice_01>From the reports of our forces out on
expedition, the number of Molduga
remaining is...zero?
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseL>Unbelievable! You hunted them all?
Talk0067:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Notice_01>From what our squads tell me, the
number of Hinoxes remaining is...zero?

<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseL>Unbelievable! You hunted them all?
